actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston under the authority of the order of Mar  4, 88 with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 100-296.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 579.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to clarify the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to make land exchanges within the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Amends the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act to state that land conveyances or exchanges involving lands within the Coastal Plain of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge cannot be made without prior approval by law.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to make land exchanges within the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
